cons: Pregnant women should avoid this herb.
Even small amount (10mg) of the herbal oil can cause the following symptoms – vomiting, convulsions, temporary deafness and respiratory problems.
description: Epazote protects the skin from free radical damage, and can also neutralize free radicals that cause various types of cancer and other chronic diseases.
Epazote has a significant level of fiber, which helps to improve the digestive process and stimulates the smooth movement of the bowels.
Epazote contains more than 50% of the daily recommended amount of folic acid, which is important for proper development and growth.
